price: 33. esos que temen al Clemente a pesar de no verlo[963]y se presentan ante Al-lah con un corazón arrepentido.
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
